text: Magic Kingdom is a Belgian power metal band,formed in 1998 by Belgian guitarist Dushan Petrossi. ==Timeline== ==Discography== *The Arrival (1999) *Metallic Tragedy (2004) *Symphony of War (2010) *Savage Requiem (2015) *MetAlmighty (2019) ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Musical groups established in 1998 Category:Power metal musical groups Category:Belgian heavy metal musical groups
title: Magic Kingdom (band)
